Package httpclient.util

Class JsonValidator

java.lang.Object
httpclient.util.JsonValidator
public class JsonValidator
extends java.lang.Object
An utility class for validating a json content. This class uses state charts defined at https://www.json.org/json-en.html

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    JsonValidator()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean isValidJson​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Validates a json content.
    private static int meetArray​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json array structure using https://www.json.org/img/array.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json array.
    private static int meetNumber​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json number structure using https://www.json.org/img/number.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json number.
    private static int meetObject​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json object structure using https://www.json.org/img/object.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json object.
    private static int meetString​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json string structure and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json string.
    private static int meetValue​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json value structure using https://www.json.org/img/value.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json value.
    private static int meetWhitespace​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
    Gets a content as input and meets a json whitespace structure and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json whirespace.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonValidator

      public JsonValidator()

  • Method Details

    • isValidJson

      public static boolean isValidJson​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Validates a json content.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - json contend for validation
      Returns:
      true if input json is valid, false otherwise

    • meetArray

      private static int meetArray​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json array structure using https://www.json.org/img/array.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json array. If the structure does not meet a json array, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json array
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json array or -1 if the structure does not meet a json array

    • meetObject

      private static int meetObject​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json object structure using https://www.json.org/img/object.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json object. If the structure does not meet a json object, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json object
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json object or -1 if the structure does not meet a json object

    • meetValue

      private static int meetValue​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json value structure using https://www.json.org/img/value.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json value. If the structure does not meet a json value, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json value
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json value or -1 if the structure does not meet a json value

    • meetNumber

      private static int meetNumber​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json number structure using https://www.json.org/img/number.png state machine and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json number. If the structure does not meet a json number, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json number
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json number or -1 if the structure does not meet a json number

    • meetString

      private static int meetString​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json string structure and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json string. If the structure does not meet a json string, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json string
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json string or -1 if the structure does not meet a json string

    • meetWhitespace

      private static int meetWhitespace​(java.lang.String jsonContent)
      Gets a content as input and meets a json whitespace structure and returns number of character that it consumed to meet the json whirespace. If the structure does not meet a json whitespace, it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      jsonContent - content that can start with a json whitespace
      Returns:
      number of consumed characters to meet the json whitespace or -1 if the structure does not meet a json whitespace
